episodes.title: Extraction
episodes.plot: As the Strike Team tries to end a race war between Blacks and Mexicans, Dutch and Claudette investigate a riot at a high school that also stem from racial tensions.

episodes.title: Enemy of Good
episodes.plot: Lem's loyalty to Vic is tested when he's interrogated by Lt. Kavanaugh and Aceveda about the Strike Team's corrupt past.

episodes.title: Jailbait
episodes.plot: While the Strike Team figures out their next step concerning IAD's investigation into Lem, they put Tina undercover to help bust a sex trafficking operation.

episodes.title: Tapa Boca
episodes.plot: As Becca contemplates whether or not to represent the Strike Team, Vic discovers the truth about Emolia.

episodes.title: Trophy
episodes.plot: Kavanaugh bugs the Strike Team's clubhouse to get his stalled investigation back on track as Vic and the guys try to end a deadly prescription drug ring.

episodes.title: Rap Payback
episodes.plot: The walls close in on Vic when Kavanaugh invades the Barn and sets up office.

episodes.title: Man Inside
episodes.plot: The Strike Team's solidarity begins to crack under Kavanaugh's constant scrutiny.

episodes.title: Kavanaugh
episodes.plot: As Kavanaugh deals with the emotional circumstances surrounding the return of his ex-wife, his obsession to take down the Strike Team comes to a head.

episodes.title: Smoked
episodes.plot: With their finances frozen, Vic and his guys are forced to find other means to bail Lem out of jail.

episodes.title: Of Mice and Lem
episodes.plot: While Lem prepares to plead guilty to the heroin charges, Vic strikes a deal with Antwon Mitchell that will guarantee Lem's safety in prison.

episodes.title: Postpartum
episodes.plot: Vic arranges to get Lem safely out of the country and set up a new life for him in Mexico.
